Notifications¶

notifications.py define notification types necessary for the Early Warning Score policy triggers.

Patient Assessment¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification_assessment[source]¶

This notification addresses the specific need of the patient needing medical assessment.

complete(cr, uid, activity_id, context=None)[source]¶

completes the activity and triggers a review frequency by default.

Returns:True
Return type:bool

Inform Medical Team¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification_medical_team[source]¶

This notification addresses the specific need of the responsible medical team having to be informed about the current patient condition.

complete(cr, uid, activity_id, context=None)[source]¶

completes the activity and triggers a doctor assessment by default.

Returns:True
Return type:bool
is_cancellable(cr, uid, context=None)[source]¶

This notification is cancellable by default.

Returns:True
Return type:bool
